page: AE21008: Introduction To Flight Vehicle Controls

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: Transform Calculus 3 - 0 - 0: 3 Credits Mathematical modeling of dynamic system, Transient response analysis, Basic Control actions and response of control systems, analysis of control systems in state space, design of control systems in state space, root locus analysis and design of system by root locus method, frequency response analysis, PID controls.
page: AE21008: Introduction To Flight Vehicle Controls

title: Concepts taught in class
text: Classical Control theory basics, Time domain and Frequency domain, introduction to PID and State space control
page: AE21008: Introduction To Flight Vehicle Controls

title: Student Opinion
text: Introductory course to control theory, paves way for further courses
page: AE21008: Introduction To Flight Vehicle Controls

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Follow the lecture slides and practice questions from the prescribed textbooks. MATLAB examples are good to visulize
page: AE21008: Introduction To Flight Vehicle Controls
